mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_SEQ as reportSeq, CONTENT as content, STATUS as status, REPORT_NAME as reportName, USER_ID as userId, IN_DATE as inDate, UP_DATE as modDate, IN_USER_ID as inUserId, UP_USER_ID as upUserId FROM REPORT order by STATUS, IN_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT(REPORT_SEQ, CONTENT, REPORT_NAME, USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_DATE, IN_USER_ID, UP_USER_ID, STATUS) VALUES (REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{reportName}, #{userId}, sysdate, sysdate, #{id}, #{id}, 'N')
